name: Arrow Knight of Ull'r: Global Game Jam Submission
name_original: Arrow Knight of Ull'r: Global Game Jam Submission
description:
The Kingdom  has been lost. Many have fallen trying to find their way amidst the insurmountable darkness of The Vord. So long as the Hex King has the soul of the land in his grasp, no peace shall be known. Countless brave heroes have thrown themselves into the realms of chaos, yet the cold life sucking darkness remains. Arash Hay'k, a descendent of the Legendary Arrow Knights of Ull'r has stepped forward in an attempt to bring peace back to a land devoid of hope.

I made this game as a submission into the Global Game Jam 2021. While I typically like  to work in a team, I arrived late to this jam and had some difficulty finding one. So I decided to utilize the Corgi Engine and spend my two days creating art assets. The theme this year is Lost and Found. I took up archery during the pandemic and found it rather frustrating to lose so many arrows when first starting out.  I suppose this game is meant to emulate that feeling to a certain degree.  The functionality of the game is a bit buggy as I am not much of a coder, but I feel it gets the point across.  

Controls:

A - Left

D - Right

Space - Jump

Hold Shift - Run

I - Inventory

Hold down Left Click - Shoot

Left Click - move through dialogue
